body.name: AutoSky Dash Cam Front and Rear - Dash Camera for Cars Mini Dash Cam Full HD with 32GB Memory Card, 3 inch IPS Screen, Accident Lock, Loop Recording, Parking Monitor, Motion Detection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: This sleek and compact dash cam won't obscure your view. It comes with wide angle 1080P front camera and a 720P HD waterproof rear camera that captures your back. Meanwhile, the 3” IPS display make video recording more vivid, colorful and clear.

In order to allow you to use the dash cam as quickly as possible, we provide a 32GB memory card, you do not need to buy this card additionally. It is plug and play, which is very convenient. The mount is a suction cup which allows flexible placement anywhere in the windshield.

The loop recording function means the newly recorded video will overwrite the oldest video when the memory card is full. With the built-in G-Sensor, the video will be automatically be locked and saved without being overwritten when the car is hit or you can lock the video manually by pressing a button.

We have added a trim bar and cable clips to help you install the dash cam as easy as possible, no experience is needed to install. In addition to the basic functions, the dash cam has more features like Motion Detection, Voice Recording and Photo Function and so many more!
US Company based in Houston with professional support who are ready to help you at every step of the way. Let us watch your front and back with our new dash cam. We are available 24/7 for any help!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Protect Your Car with our Dash Cam A dash camera for cars can provide an extra layer of security for your vehicle. It can deter potential thieves and vandals and can also help you to identify anyone who might have damaged your vehicle.

AutoSky Front and Rear Dash Cam Front and Rear Dash Cam Your Dash cam acts as a dual camera system with Wide-Angle front and waterproof rear view cameras. Gravity Sensor Can detect sudden movements or impacts, and it also has a motion detection feature that can trigger recording when it detects movement. Loop recording The car camera will continually record over the oldest footage when the memory card is full, allowing you to record an unlimited amount of footage. HDR technology Your dash cam front and rear helps to improve visibility in low light conditions by combining multiple exposures into a single image.

Wide viewing angle Capture a large area in front of and behind the vehicle. It also has a 3 inch IPS screen perfect for viewing if you do not currently have a backup camera installed on your car. Wide angle Loop Recording Camera will continually record over the oldest footage when the memory card is full, and the parking guard feature can be used to continuously record while the vehicle is parked. Loop Record Waterproof Rear Camera You can protect the back of your car with the included rear-view camera, it also has a 3 inch IPS screen perfect for viewing if you do not currently have a backup camera installed on your car. Rear Camera Parking Guard Keep your vehicle safe while parked, your AutoSky Dash cam starts recording when motion is detected, even when the power is Off, thanks to its rechargeable battery. Park Guard

Benefits of having a Dash Cam Front and Rear Improved coverage: You'll be able to capture video of any incidents that occur around your vehicle.Greater Protection: Can provide an extra level of protection in case of an accident or collision.Enhanced security: Serves as a security device, helping to deter potential thieves or vandals.Improved Driving Habits: Driver is more mindful of driving habits since they are being recorded. Note to customers: To Access Backup Camera footage hold down the UP or Down button while in preview. It will pass over to only Reverse Camera footage. To go back to Front Camera footage Hold down the UP or Down button again.For the backup camera you can connect the wire to your backup lights and it will only turn on while reversing otherwise ignore the red cable and it will record as long as the camera is on.If you have any questions please reach out directly to us, we are glad to help with any issues.

HD Dash Cam Front and Rear 4K WiFi Dashcam with App Full HD Resolution High-definition video recording for clear and detailed footage Ultra HD 4K Resolution Crystal-clear video quality, capturing license plates, road signs, and more. Motion detection feature Recording when motion is detected even when the vehicle is parked Wi-Fi Connectivity to App Access your dashcam footage, download and adjust settings through the mobile app 32 GB Memory Card Included Loop recording feature ensures continuous recording without running out of space 64 GB Memory Card Included With loop recording feature that overwrites the oldest footage with the newest Back Up Camera Included Capture both front and rear views simultaneously. GPS Feature Track your route, view speed, and pinpoint your location throughout your drive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for price comes with sd card

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good For Price
reviews.reviewText: Pros-* Good how much it costs* The suction cup stays on (had another one that required a sticky backside but would fall off bc of the heat)* The instruction manual is understandable and easy to follow* Already comes with micro sd card and back camera*Front camera has a great quality; even at nightCons:* Back camera doesn’t have good quality at night (litterally black screen) but it’s fine* I have it set on loop recording so it can just overwrite old camera footage; however it doesn’t do that I have to manually erase all the footage so it can continue recordingAll in all it’s good for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Optics good, back up cam a definite plus. Power cord, heavy duty. I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Una Elegante Cámara completa
reviews.reviewText: Esta elegante y compacta cámara de salpicadero es una opción sólida para quienes buscan una mayor seguridad y registro de sus viajes en automóvil.La cámara viene con una cámara frontal de gran angular 1080P y una cámara trasera impermeable HD 720P, lo que te permite capturar tanto lo que ocurre frente a ti como en la parte trasera del vehículo. La pantalla IPS de 3 pulgadas proporciona una grabación de video más vívida, colorida y clara, lo que mejora la experiencia visual al reproducir los videos grabados.Una característica conveniente de este producto es que viene con una tarjeta de memoria de 32 GB, lo que evita la necesidad de comprar una tarjeta adicional. Es un sistema Plug and Play, lo que significa que es fácil de instalar y comenzar a usar de inmediato. Los frenos de montaje con ventosa permiten una colocación flexible en cualquier lugar del parabrisas.La función de grabación en bucle garantiza que el video más reciente sobrescriba el video más antiguo cuando la tarjeta de memoria esté llena, lo que asegura que siempre haya espacio disponible para nuevas grabaciones. Además, la cámara cuenta con un sensor G integrado que bloquea y guarda automáticamente el video cuando se detectan golpes o colisiones, evitando que se sobrescriba. También puedes bloquear manualmente el video pulsando un botón.La cámara de salpicadero incluye una barra de molduras y clips de cable para facilitar la instalación, sin necesidad de experiencia previa. Además de las funciones básicas de grabación, también ofrece características adicionales como detección de movimiento, grabación de voz y función de fotos. Esta cámara de salpicadero es ofrecida por una empresa estadounidense con sede en Houston, y cuentan con un soporte profesional disponible las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana, listo para ayudarte en cada paso del camino. Viene con características convenientes, una instalación sencilla y un soporte profesional para ayudarte en caso de necesitar asistencia.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The motion settings doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: Motion detection doesn’t work, park protection doesn’t work, never cuts on when something in front of car is moving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars False Marketing Overpriced For The Quality
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the video recorded looks like 480p it looks cheap and nowhere near 1080 also the rear camera stopped working on its own in less than a week it just went dark and later wouldnt even show up on the corner of the screen lastly the cable for the front camera is ridiculously long and the cable for the rear camera is not long enough to reach my license plate on my truck I drilled a hole near the back of the truck to make it work out and for nothing because it just stopped working and now i have a tiny screw hole to cover up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera great company that makes it sucks
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this but it only comes with a 32 MB SD card and I wanted more memory so I changed it over to a 256 MB but the camera would not let me format it. So I tried contacting the company through auto sky and also the information on the back of the instruction manual heard absolutely nothing from them. But Amazon actually helped me out , if you buy this camera, I want to change the SD card you need to make sure that the power cables are disconnected. Then you need to wait 5 to 7 minutes put the new SD card in and plug back in the power cords. Then it should let you format your SD card, if it doesn’t work the first time, try it again. Thank God for Amazon customer service and tech-support. Don’t even bother trying to get a hold of the company because they’re useless contacted them numerous times got no answer but the camera works really well and just because the company is crap, doesn’t mean their product is .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Video quality is excellent. Rear camera wire is too short to connect to the camera.
reviews.reviewText: Follow up review: Have attempted multiple times and in two different ways to contact the Pro Master Electronic company to see if an extension cable is available to purchase. No Response! Dropping my 4 stars to 2. Only forward half of the new cameras will be useful...Bought two AutoSky sets one for a Hyundai Sonata and the other for a Toyota Tundra. Tested front and rear cameras before fully installing in the Sonata and they work fine. However, The wire for the rear camera is at least 3 feet too short to connect. It would be long enough if the cable were laid across the seats and into the trunk. However, installing the wire so that it is hidden requires additional wire. Already know the rear camera wire for the Tundra will be far too short.
Me gustó por el precio y volvería a comprar otra
Es un buen producto en relación con el precio, lo único es que la cámara trasera trae un pegote muy malo que no la sostiene, pero puedes instalarla con cinta doble cara.

Funciona adecuadamente, ya trae su tarjeta de memoria incluida, solo que el orificio de plastico que tiene para adjuntarla en la contra del chupon del vidrio, esta muy cerca de la conexion de la entrada del cable del encendedor y se afloja muy facil y se cae del chupon, ya se me ha caido al menos 10 veces, hasta que le puse una capa de bolsa de plastico entre el plastico de la camara y el chupon para que hiciera mas persion y asi ya no se cayo. De ahi en mas, hace su proposito.

Funcionaba bien los primeros 3 días, aunque a veces prendía de inmediato cuando encendia el carro y a veces tardaba unos 15 min en prender, la grabación es buena y tiene distintos modos, al cuarto día la cámara dejó de prender, y la de reversa nunca funcionó

Cosas por las que no la recomiendo:La pantalla no viene protegida y llegó rayada.La tuerca para mantener derecha la cámara es demasiado endeble(que parece que se va a romper) y siempre anda chueca la cámara.No tiene batería recargable, osea que si o sí la debes mantener conectada.Si apagas el auto y lo prendes después de un rato la cámara no prende rápido, tarda hasta 5 min y eso si lo hace, si no hay desconectarla y conectarla.El instructivo viene demasiadooo simplificado.La gomita se va gastando con el calor y si la tienes que mover y en una de esas no pegó bien, se cayó y se averió la pantalla como las rayas de pixeles muertos (puse foto).La calidad de imagen está medianamente pasable en el día pero en la noche sí está bastante feita :(Para que pase todo eso en menos de un mes, considero que no es un buen producto aunque su empaque se vea muy pro.Cosas buenas:Que el menú es sencillo.trae todos los accesorios.El precio, si te sale buena :(
